channel.title: How do I add objects and make ladders work?
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm a self admitted noob and leecher, so i'll be expecting loads of replies like 'so ur basicly a leecher then lololol', but I'm asking how do I place objects and give them functions?
The source i'm using is based on AllstarScape, with the same mod/admin zone except there is nothing but 4 blokes and some banks in there. I would like to add a chest which gives items, and ladders to the floor above. I might add more objects there if I can.
Any help?

item.title: How do I add objects and make ladders work?
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Thanks Rog3r, I’ll definitely use that teleport option.
And nice img link lol.

Oh and i suppose for ladders I would just need to find a command which increases/decreases height by 1, yes?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add objects and make ladders work?

item.title: How do I add objects and make ladders work?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

MOth Force THru window:

so ur basicly a leecher lololol

^ Asshole

And to add objects, you first will get there ID and the X axis and Y axis.
Then, in objectClick1 or objectClick2 you will put them there.

Like this (may not be right - but you can always use the other things as examples)

if (objectID == OBJECTID && objectX == OBJECTX && objectY == OBJECTY) { teleportToX = teleportToY = addItem(995, 10); sendMessage("Hey guys"); customINT = 1; addSkillXP(139, 13); }

You can add many functions to it, but thats just an example

Mod Umair:

lol i like ur name…

Wtf?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add objects and make ladders work?
